languages.text: "Шпиль Опустошительной бури. Обитель моего кабала. Прибежище от происков врагов и одновременно — смертельная ловушка для тех, кто слишком слаб и мягок для наших рядов". {n}Друкари склоняет голову набок и бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "В недрах шпиля скрыт секрет: древние врата Паутины, которые запечатаны многие, многие столетия. Иремерисс приберегала их на случай, если на шее кабала затянется удавка Векта: никто, кроме нее и еще одного кабалита, не знает, куда именно в реальный мир ведут врата. Идеальный путь для отступления. И я могу открыть его для тебя".

"The Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The seat of my Kabal. Both a place to find respite from the scheming of our enemies and a deadly trap for those too weak and soft for our ranks." {n}Marazhai tilts his head and glances at you.{/n} "The heart of the spire contains a secret: an ancient Webway Gate that has remained sealed for many, many aeons. Yremeryss kept it in case Vect's noose happened to tighten around the Kabal's neck. No one save for her and a certain other Kabalite knows where exactly in realspace the Gate leads. A perfect escape route. And I can open it for you."
languages.original_text: "Шпиль Опустошительной бури. Обитель моего кабала. Прибежище от происков врагов и одновременно — смертельная ловушка для тех, кто слишком слаб и мягок для наших рядов". {n}Друкари склоняет голову набок и бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "В недрах шпиля скрыт секрет: древние врата Паутины, которые запечатаны многие, многие столетия. languages.text: « La tour de la Tempête ravageuse. Le siège de ma Kabale. C'est à la fois un havre de paix, loin des manigances de nos ennemis, et un piège mortel pour tous ceux qui sont trop faibles pour rejoindre nos rangs. » {n}Marazhai penche la tête et vous observe.{/n} « Le cœur de la tour renferme un secret, un ancien portail de la Toile qui est resté scellé des millénaires durant. Yremeryss le conservait dans l'éventualité où les griffes de Vect se resserreraient autour de la Kabale. Personne hormis elle et un certain Kabalite ne sait exactement où mène le portail dans l'espace réel. C'est une issue parfaite. Et je peux l'ouvrir pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "The Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The seat of my Kabal. Both a place to find respite from the scheming of our enemies and a deadly trap for those too weak and soft for our ranks." {n}Marazhai tilts his head and glances at you.{/n} "The heart of the spire contains a secret: an ancient Webway Gate that has remained sealed for many, many aeons. languages.text: “这里就是狂风阴谋团的尖塔，我的王座所在之处。这里既是躲避强敌的避风港，又是杀死软弱敌人的致命陷阱。”{n}玛拉斋歪着头，看了你一眼。{/n}“尖塔中心包含着一个秘密，那里藏着一扇网道门，已经被封印了亿万年之久。伊芮梅莉斯一直留着这扇门，万一维克特打算拿狂风阴谋团开刀，她那扇门就能派上用场。除了她和阴谋团的另一位成员之外，没人知道那扇门通往真实世界的什么地方。那是条完美的逃生路线，我可以帮你打开它。”
languages.original_text: "The Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The seat of my Kabal. Both a place to find respite from the scheming of our enemies and a deadly trap for those too weak and soft for our ranks." {n}Marazhai tilts his head and glances at you.{/n} "The heart of the spire contains a secret: an ancient Webway Gate that has remained sealed for many, many aeons. Yremeryss kept it in case Vect's noose happened to tighten around the Kabal's neck. No one save for her and a certain other Kabalite knows where exactly in realspace the Gate leads. A perfect escape route. And I can open it for you."

traits.locale_text: “这里就是狂风阴谋团的尖塔，我的王座所在之处。这里既是躲避强敌的避风港，又是杀死软弱敌人的致命陷阱。”{n}玛拉斋歪着头，看了你一眼。{/n}“尖塔中心包含着一个秘密，那里藏着一扇网道门，已经被封印了亿万年之久。伊芮梅莉斯一直留着这扇门，万一维克特打算拿狂风阴谋团开刀，她那扇门就能派上用场。除了她和阴谋团的另一位成员之外，没人知道那扇门通往真实世界的什么地方。那是条完美的逃生路线，我可以帮你打开它。”

languages.text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔。我が陰謀団の本拠地。そこは俺たちにとって敵の謀略から逃れる避難地であると同時に、軟弱な加入志望者をふるい落とす場所でもある」{n}マラズハイは首をかしげ、あなたを見た。 {/n}「尖塔の中心には秘密が隠されている。永遠にわたって封印されたままの古代の網辻門があるのだ。陰謀団がヴェクトの包囲網下に置かれた時のために、イレメリスが守っていた。彼女ともう一人のカバライト以外は、門がリアルスペースのどこに通じているのか知らない。完璧な脱出ルートだ。そしてこの俺がお前のために開いてやれる」
languages.original_text: "The Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The seat of my Kabal. Both a place to find respite from the scheming of our enemies and a deadly trap for those too weak and soft for our ranks." {n}Marazhai tilts his head and glances at you.{/n} "The heart of the spire contains a secret: an ancient Webway Gate that has remained sealed for many, many aeons. Yremeryss kept it in case Vect's noose happened to tighten around the Kabal's neck. No one save for her and a certain other Kabalite knows where exactly in realspace the Gate leads. A perfect escape route. And I can open it for you."

traits.locale_text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔。我が陰謀団の本拠地。そこは俺たちにとって敵の謀略から逃れる避難地であると同時に、軟弱な加入志望者をふるい落とす場所でもある」{n}マラズハイは首をかしげ、あなたを見た。 {/n}「尖塔の中心には秘密が隠されている。永遠にわたって封印されたままの古代の網辻門があるのだ。陰謀団がヴェクトの包囲網下に置かれた時のために、イレメリスが守っていた。彼女ともう一人のカバライト以外は、門がリアルスペースのどこに通じているのか知らない。完璧な脱出ルートだ。そしてこの俺がお前のために開いてやれる」

languages.text: "Der Turm des plündernden Sturms. Der Sitz meiner Kabale. Ein Ort, wo wir uns vor den Intrigen unserer Feinde sicher sind. Er wird aber zur tödlichen Falle für alle zu Schwachen und Weichen in unseren Reihen." {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite und blickt dich an.{/n} "Das Herz des Turms birgt ein Geheimnis – ein uraltes Netzportal, das vor etlichen Äonen versiegelt wurde. Yremeryss behielt es in der Hinterhand, falls sich Vects Schlinge zu fest um den Hals der Kabale ziehen würde. Niemand außer ihr und einem bestimmten anderen Mitglieds der Kabale weiß, wo das Tor genau hinführt im Realraum. Der perfekte Fluchtweg. Und ich kann ihn für Euch öffnen."
languages.original_text: "The Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The seat of my Kabal. Both a place to find respite from the scheming of our enemies and a deadly trap for those too weak and soft for our ranks." {n}Marazhai tilts his head and glances at you.{/n} "The heart of the spire contains a secret: an ancient Webway Gate that has remained sealed for many, many aeons. Yremeryss kept it in case Vect's noose happened to tighten around the Kabal's neck. No one save for her and a certain other Kabalite knows where exactly in realspace the Gate leads. A perfect escape route. And I can open it for you."

Er wird aber zur tödlichen Falle für alle zu Schwachen und Weichen in unseren Reihen." {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite und blickt dich an.{/n} "Das Herz des Turms birgt ein Geheimnis – ein uraltes Netzportal, das vor etlichen Äonen versiegelt wurde. Yremeryss behielt es in der Hinterhand, falls sich Vects Schlinge zu fest um den Hals der Kabale ziehen würde. Niemand außer ihr und einem bestimmten anderen Mitglieds der Kabale weiß, wo das Tor genau hinführt im Realraum. Der perfekte Fluchtweg. Und ich kann ihn für Euch öffnen."

languages.text: «La torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. El cuartel general de mi kábala. Un lugar donde descansar de las intrigas de nuestros enemigos, y al mismo tiempo una trampa mortal para los débiles y pusilánimes que no son dignos de unirse a nosotros». {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza y te mira de reojo.{/n} «El corazón de la torre encierra un secreto: un antiguo portal a la Telaraña que ha permanecido sellado durante incontables eones. Yremeryss lo conservaba en caso de que Vect estrechase la soga en torno al cuello de la kábala. Nadie excepto ella y otro kabalista sabe exactamente a qué lugar del espacio real conduce ese portal. Es una ruta de escape ideal. Y puedo abrirla para ti».
languages.original_text: "The Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The seat of my Kabal. Both a place to find respite from the scheming of our enemies and a deadly trap for those too weak and soft for our ranks." {n}Marazhai tilts his head and glances at you.{/n} "The heart of the spire contains a secret: an ancient Webway Gate that has remained sealed for many, many aeons. Yremeryss kept it in case Vect's noose happened to tighten around the Kabal's neck. No one save for her and a certain other Kabalite knows where exactly in realspace the Gate leads. A perfect escape route. And I can open it for you."

traits.locale_text: «La torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. El cuartel general de mi kábala. Un lugar donde descansar de las intrigas de nuestros enemigos, y al mismo tiempo una trampa mortal para los débiles y pusilánimes que no son dignos de unirse a nosotros». {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza y te mira de reojo.{/n} «El corazón de la torre encierra un secreto: un antiguo portal a la Telaraña que ha permanecido sellado durante incontables eones. Yremeryss lo conservaba en caso de que Vect estrechase la soga en torno al cuello de la kábala. Nadie excepto ella y otro kabalista sabe exactamente a qué lugar del espacio real conduce ese portal. Es una ruta de escape ideal. Y puedo abrirla para ti».

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi. Kabalımın merkezi. Oraya giderek düşmanlarımızın komplolarından bir süreliğine kaçabiliriz, saflarımızda olmak için fazla zayıf ve yumuşak olanlarsa ölümcül bir tuzağa düşmüş olur." {n}Marazhai, başını yana yatırarak sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kulenin kalbinde bir sır gizlidir: Sayısız çağdır kapalı kalmış, kadim bir Ağyol Geçidi. Vect, Kabal'ın boynuna taktığı tasmayı daha da sıkarsa diye Yremeryss orayı hazırda tuttu. O ve başka birkaç Kabalist dışında kimse, Geçit'in gerçekuzayda tam olarak nereye açıldığını bilmiyor. Mükemmel bir kaçış rotası. İstersen açabilirim.
languages.original_text: "The Spire of the Reaving Tempest. The seat of my Kabal. Both a place to find respite from the scheming of our enemies and a deadly trap for those too weak and soft for our ranks." {n}Marazhai tilts his head and glances at you.{/n} "The heart of the spire contains a secret: an ancient Webway Gate that has remained sealed for many, many aeons. Yremeryss kept it in case Vect's noose happened to tighten around the Kabal's neck. No one save for her and a certain other Kabalite knows where exactly in realspace the Gate leads. A perfect escape route. And I can open it for you."

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga'nın Kulesi. Kabal'ımın mekânı. Hem düşmanlarımızın komplolarından bir süreliğine kaçabileceğimiz bir yer hem de saflarımıza katılmak için fazla zayıf ve yumuşak olanlar için ölümcül bir tuzak." {n}Marazhai başını yana yatırarak sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kulenin kalbinde bir sır gizlidir: Sayısız çağdır kapalı kalmış, kadim bir Ağyol Geçidi. Vect'in Kabal'ın boynundaki tasması sıkılaşırsa diye Yremeryss onu kendi elinde tuttu. Onun ve birkaç diğer Kabalistin dışında hiç kimse Geçit'in gerçekuzayda tam olarak nereye açıldığını bilmiyor. Mükemmel bir kaçış rotası. Onu senin için açabilirim."
